bug.author: AlekseySh
bug.description: All my links in the format <http.somesite.com> from the source file disappeared in the labelling interface. Is it possible to turning of such behaviour?

comments.comment: Can you show screenshot, label config and json task example to clarify?

Fixed in the latest release and was confirmed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AlekseySh>@AlekseySh</denchmark-link> in the Slack channel. Thanks for reporting, and all the other excellent feedback!
